tc 2.1 Create a role skill with two skil.payload: mutation($role_id: Int!, $skill_id1: Int!, $skill_id2: Int!){RoleSkillsOverwrite(roleId: $role_id, skills:[{skillId: $skill_id1, weight: 0.6}, {skillId:$skill_id2, weight: 0.4}]){roleId, id, roleId, skill{id, name}}}

tc 2.2 Create a role skill with three sk.payload: mutation($role_id: Int!, $skill_id1: Int!, $skill_id2: Int!, $skill_id3: Int!){RoleSkillsOverwrite(roleId: $role_id, skills:[{skillId: $skill_id1, weight: 0.6}, {skillId:$skill_id2, weight: 0.2}, {skillId:$skill_id3, weight: 0.2}]){roleId, id, roleId, skill{id, name}}}
